      • corsShowPost

        @OPTIONS
 @Path(value="/")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response corsShowPost()
        Options request for /
        Returns:
        Response with all needed headers

      • showPost

        @POST
 @Path(value="/")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response showPost(java.lang.String jsonInput)
        Post request to get posts. Only public post if user is no true friend.
        Parameters:
        jsonInput - 
         {
   "groupID":0, //optional if given uses group
   "userID":0, //optional if given uses user
   "session":"sessionID"
 }
        Returns:
         {
   "postList": [
     {
       "author":authorID number,
       "content":"content text",
       "id":postID number,
       "owner":ownerID number,
       "postDate":timestamp number,
       "upVotes": [
         {
           "date":timestamp number,
           "voter":voterID number
         },
       ],
       "private":true/false
     },
   ],
   "successful":true
 }

        @OPTIONS
 @Path(value="/newsfeed")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response corsGetFeed()

      • getFeed

        @POST
 @Path(value="/newsfeed")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getFeed(java.lang.String jsonInput)
        Gets the newsfeed for the current user
        Parameters:
        jsonInput - 
         {
   "session":"sessionID"
 }
        Returns:
         {
   "postList": [
     {
       "author":authorID number,
       "content":"content text",
       "id":postID number,
       "owner":ownerID number,
       "postDate":timestamp number,
       "upVotes": [
         {
           "date":timestamp number,
           "voter":voterID number
         },
       ],
       "private":true/false
     },
   ],
   "successful":true
 }

      • addPost

        @POST
 @Path(value="/add")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response addPost(java.lang.String jsonInput)
        Save new post
        Parameters:
        jsonInput - 
         {
   "groupID":0, //optional if given uses group
   "userID":0, //optional if given uses user
   "session":"sessionID"
   "post": {
     "content":"",
     "private":true/false
   }
 }
        Returns:
         {
   "successful":true
 }

        @PUT
 @Path(value="/update")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response updatePost(java.lang.String jsonInput)
        Doesn't check if the post is made by the user, but edits a post.
        Parameters:
        jsonInput - 
         {
   "session":"sessionID"
   "id":0,
   "content":"", //optional
   "private":true/false //optional
 }
        Returns:
         {
   "successful":true
 }

      • showVotes

        @POST
 @Path(value="/votes")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response showVotes(java.lang.String jsonInput)
        Post request to get upVotes of a post
        Parameters:
        jsonInput - 
         {
   "id":postID number,
   "session":"sessionID"
 }
        Returns:
         {
   "voteList": [
     {
       "date":voteDate number,
       "voter":{
         "firstName":firstName text,
         "name":name text,
         "username":username text
       }
     },
   ],
   "successful":true
 }

      • showComments

        @POST
 @Path(value="/comments")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response showComments(java.lang.String jsonInput)
        Post request to get upVotes of a post
        Parameters:
        jsonInput - 
         {
   "id":postID number,
   "session":"sessionID"
 }
        Returns:
         {
   "commentList": [
     {
       "id":commentID,
       "date":commentDate number,
       "author":{
         "firstName":"firstName text",
         "lastName":"name text",
         "username":"username text"
       },
       "content":"content text"
     },
   ],
   "successful":true
 }
